name: Arrow Busters
overview: You have landed on a new planet and have built TND HQ down there. However, some crazy aliens want to enter the planet to have a big party. So it is up to you to release them from the space craft and then land them safely on to the landing pad.Don't let an alien touch the bottom of the ground otherwise it means the game is over. This game was entered for the 2004 Mini Game competition and published in GO64! 2003/07.
